COMMENT_ACTION.description: A text on the button that works with comments

DEFINITION_ACTION.description: A text on the button that works with definitions

INFLECTION_ACTION.description: A text on the button that works with inflections

LEMMA_ACTION.description: A text on the button that works with lemmas

WORD_FORM_ACTION.description: A text on the button that works with word forms

REMOVE_ACTION.description: A text on the button that removes data

ADD_BTN.description: A text on the button that adds new form data

SAVE_BTN.description: A text on the button that saves form data

CANCEL_BTN.description: A text on the button that cancels the form action

REMOVE_BTN.description: A text on the button in the form that removes some data

EDIT_COMMENT_HEADLINE.description: A headline of the comment editing form

SAMPLE_COMMENT_TEXT.message: A comment about the part of speech of the lexeme
SAMPLE_COMMENT_TEXT.description: A sample text of a comment that is placed inside the comment editing form

REMOVE_COMMENT_HEADLINE.description: A headline of the comment removal form

REMOVE_COMMENT_WARNING.message: Are you sure that you want to remove this comment?
REMOVE_COMMENT_WARNING.description: A warning from inside the comment removal form

DEFINITION_HEADLINE.description: A headline of the form to add a definition

DEFINITION_LABEL.description: A label of a definition input area in a definition form

SOURCE_LABEL.description: A label of a source input area in a definition form

NUMBER_LABEL.description: A label of a number input area in a definition form

CASE_LABEL.description: A label of a case input area in a definition form

GENDER_LABEL.description: A label of a gender input area in a definition form

SELECT_VALUE_LABEL.description: A label that prompts a selection of a value in a drop-down list

REMOVE_DEFINITION_HEADLINE.description: A headline of the definition removal form

REMOVE_DEFINITION_WARNING.message: Are you sure that you want to remove this definition?
REMOVE_DEFINITION_WARNING.description: A warning from inside the definition removal form

ADD_INFLECTION_HEADLINE.description: A headline of the form to add an inflection
